languages.text: "Я не в первый — и, боюсь, не в последний — раз становлюсь причиной погибели тех, кто был мне близок. И у этого всегда были причины. Иногда продиктованные долгом. Иногда — личной волей".

traits.locale_text: "Я не в первый — и, боюсь, не в последний — раз становлюсь причиной погибели тех, кто был мне близок. И у этого всегда были причины. Иногда продиктованные долгом. Иногда — личной волей".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "This is not the first time — or the last, I fear — that I will cause the death of someone close to me. There have always been reasons for it. Sometimes the reasons are dictated by duty. Sometimes by my own personal volition."
languages.original_text: "Я не в первый — и, боюсь, не в последний — раз становлюсь причиной погибели тех, кто был мне близок. И у этого всегда были причины. Иногда продиктованные долгом. Иногда — личной волей".

traits.locale_text: "This is not the first time — or the last, I fear — that I will cause the death of someone close to me. There have always been reasons for it. Sometimes the reasons are dictated by duty. Sometimes by my own personal volition."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is not the first time — or the last, I fear — that I will cause the death of someone close to me. There have always been reasons for it. Sometimes the reasons are dictated by duty. Sometimes by my own personal volition."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is not the first time — or the last, I fear — that I will cause the death of someone close to me. There have always been reasons for it. Sometimes the reasons are dictated by duty. Sometimes by my own personal volition."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is not the first time — or the last, I fear — that I will cause the death of someone close to me. There have always been reasons for it. Sometimes the reasons are dictated by duty. Sometimes by my own personal volition."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «No es la primera vez, y me temo que tampoco será la última, que causo la muerte de alguien que me importa. Siempre ha existido algún motivo. A veces esos motivos vienen dictados por el deber. Otras, por mi propia voluntad».
languages.original_text: "This is not the first time — or the last, I fear — that I will cause the death of someone close to me. There have always been reasons for it. Sometimes the reasons are dictated by duty. Sometimes by my own personal volition."

traits.locale_text: «No es la primera vez, y me temo que tampoco será la última, que causo la muerte de alguien que me importa. Siempre ha existido algún motivo. A veces esos motivos vienen dictados por el deber. Otras, por mi propia voluntad».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「親しい人を死なせてしまうのはこれが初めてではないし、これで最後でもないと思っている。いつも理由があってのことだ。義務に左右されることもあれば、個人的な意志でそうなったこともある」
languages.original_text: "This is not the first time — or the last, I fear — that I will cause the death of someone close to me. There have always been reasons for it. Sometimes the reasons are dictated by duty. Sometimes by my own personal volition."

traits.locale_text: 「親しい人を死なせてしまうのはこれが初めてではないし、これで最後でもないと思っている。いつも理由があってのことだ。義務に左右されることもあれば、個人的な意志でそうなったこともある」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “这已经不是我第一次害死我亲近的人了，恐怕也不会是最后一次。像这样的事情，始终都是有原因的，有时是职责使然，有时则是出于我自己的意愿。”
languages.original_text: "This is not the first time — or the last, I fear — that I will cause the death of someone close to me. There have always been reasons for it. Sometimes the reasons are dictated by duty. Sometimes by my own personal volition."

traits.locale_text: “这已经不是我第一次害死我亲近的人了，恐怕也不会是最后一次。像这样的事情，始终都是有原因的，有时是职责使然，有时则是出于我自己的意愿。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas la première fois – ni la dernière, je le crains – que je suis responsable de la mort de quelqu'un qui m'est cher. Il y a toujours eu des raisons à cela. Elles étaient parfois dictées par le devoir, et parfois par ma propre volonté. »
languages.original_text: "This is not the first time — or the last, I fear — that I will cause the death of someone close to me. There have always been reasons for it. Sometimes the reasons are dictated by duty. Sometimes by my own personal volition."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas la première fois – ni la dernière, je le crains – que je suis responsable de la mort de quelqu'un qui m'est cher. Il y a toujours eu des raisons à cela. Elles étaient parfois dictées par le devoir, et parfois par ma propre volonté. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist nicht das erste und wohl leider auch nicht das letzte Mal, dass ich den Tod eines mir nahestehenden Menschen verursache. Es gab immer Gründe dafür. Manchmal wurden sie von der Pflicht diktiert. Manchmal von meinen eigenen Wünschen."
languages.original_text: "This is not the first time — or the last, I fear — that I will cause the death of someone close to me. There have always been reasons for it. Sometimes the reasons are dictated by duty. Sometimes by my own personal volition."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist nicht das erste und wohl leider auch nicht das letzte Mal, dass ich den Tod eines mir nahestehenden Menschen verursache. Es gab immer Gründe dafür. Manchmal wurden sie von der Pflicht diktiert. Manchmal von meinen eigenen Wünschen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "This is not the first time — or the last, I fear — that I will cause the death of someone close to me. There have always been reasons for it. Sometimes the reasons are dictated by duty. Sometimes by my own personal volition."

languages.text: "Korkarım bu, bana yakın birini ne ilk... Ne de son öldürüşüm olacak. Her seferinde haklı bir sebebim vardı. Kimi zaman vazife gereği... Kimi zaman da şahsi gerekçelerden."
languages.original_text: "This is not the first time — or the last, I fear — that I will cause the death of someone close to me. There have always been reasons for it. Sometimes the reasons are dictated by duty. Sometimes by my own personal volition."

traits.locale_text: "Korkarım bu, bana yakın birini ne ilk... Ne de son öldürüşüm olacak. Her seferinde haklı bir sebebim vardı. Kimi zaman vazife gereği... Kimi zaman da şahsi gerekçelerden."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
